channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IN

item.title: Report E-2024070657
item.description:
Report E-2024070657

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-07T15:13:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-12
  • City: Indianapolis
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SUPERIOR INDUSTRIAL SOLUTIONS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading, material was found leaking from the top of a drum. Upon investigation, the gasket used to secure the lid was found to be a partial gasket, resulting in the release. The lid was properly secured. The material was contained and cleaned up.

item.title: Report X-2024072140
item.description:
Report X-2024072140

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-02T18:16:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-26
  • City: GREENWOOD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024072140 Package arrived at hub QA in a red Haz tote. Upon further inspection found outer packaging soiled and stained from internal contents leaking due to loose caps and dented body. 2. X-2024072143 Plastic pail arrived at hub QA in a red Haz tote. Upon further inspection found pail soiled, the body bent, and empty from missing cap on top of pail. 3. X-2024072149 Plastic pail arrived at hub QA in a red Haz tote. Upon further inspection found pail soiled and stained from loose closure on top of pail. 4. X-2024072151 attachment Name:Hazmat-Undeclared HazMat Package Disposition 04302024.pdf. 5. X-2024072152 Plastic pail arrived at hub QA in a red Haz tote. Upon further inspection found pail soiled and stained from loose closure on top of pail.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
